propertyDescriptor.description: The input directory from which to pull files

propertyDescriptor.description: Only files whose names match the given regular expression will be picked up

table.fieldStructure:
agency_id|string||0|0|0|agency_id
agency_name|string||0|0|0|agency_name
agency_url|string||0|0|0|agency_url
agency_timezone|string||0|0|0|agency_timezone
agency_lang|string||0|0|0|agency_lang
agency_phone|string||0|0|0|agency_phone
num|int||0|0|0|num
table.feedFormat:
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hadoop.hive.serde2.OpenCSVSerde'
 WITH SERDEPROPERTIES ( 'separatorChar' = ',' ,'escapeChar' = '\\' ,'quoteChar' = '\"') STORED AS TEXTFILE

propertyDescriptor.name: Input Directory
propertyDescriptor.description: The input directory from which to pull files

propertyDescriptor.name: File Filter
propertyDescriptor.description: Only files whose names match the given regular expression will be picked up

propertyDescriptor.name: Input Directory
propertyDescriptor.description: The input directory from which to pull files

relationships.name: set state fail
relationships.description: A failure to set the state after adding the attributes to the FlowFile will route the FlowFile here.

relationships.name: success
relationships.description: All successful FlowFiles are routed to this relationship

Delete Attributes Expression.name: Delete Attributes Expression
Delete Attributes Expression.description: Regular expression for attributes to be deleted from FlowFiles.  Existing attributes that match will be deleted regardless of whether they are updated by this processor.

Store State.name: Store State
Store State.description: Select whether or not state will be stored. Selecting 'Stateless' will offer the default functionality of purely updating the attributes on a FlowFile in a stateless manner. Selecting a stateful option will not only store the attributes on the FlowFile but also in the Processors state. See the 'Stateful Usage' topic of the 'Additional Details' section of this processor's documentation for more information

Stateful Variables Initial Value.name: Stateful Variables Initial Value
Stateful Variables Initial Value.description: If using state to set/reference variables then this value is used to set the initial value of the stateful variable. This will only be used in the @OnScheduled method when state does not contain a value for the variable. This is required if running statefully but can be empty if needed.

relationships.name: success
relationships.description: All files are routed to success

Input Directory.name: Input Directory
Input Directory.description: The input directory from which to pull files

File Filter.name: File Filter
File Filter.description: Only files whose names match the given regular expression will be picked up

Path Filter.name: Path Filter
Path Filter.description: When Recurse Subdirectories is true, then only subdirectories whose path matches the given regular expression will be scanned

Batch Size.name: Batch Size
Batch Size.description: The maximum number of files to pull in each iteration

Keep Source File.name: Keep Source File
Keep Source File.description: If true, the file is not deleted after it has been copied to the Content Repository; this causes the file to be picked up continually and is useful for testing purposes.  If not keeping original NiFi will need write permissions on the directory it is pulling from otherwise it will ignore the file.

Recurse Subdirectories.name: Recurse Subdirectories
Recurse Subdirectories.description: Indicates whether or not to pull files from subdirectories

Polling Interval.name: Polling Interval
Polling Interval.description: Indicates how long to wait before performing a directory listing

Ignore Hidden Files.name: Ignore Hidden Files
Ignore Hidden Files.description: Indicates whether or not hidden files should be ignored

Minimum File Age.name: Minimum File Age
Minimum File Age.description: The minimum age that a file must be in order to be pulled; any file younger than this amount of time (according to last modification date) will be ignored

Maximum File Age.name: Maximum File Age
Maximum File Age.description: The maximum age that a file must be in order to be pulled; any file older than this amount of time (according to last modification date) will be ignored

Minimum File Size.name: Minimum File Size
Minimum File Size.description: The minimum size that a file must be in order to be pulled

Maximum File Size.name: Maximum File Size
Maximum File Size.description: The maximum size that a file can be in order to be pulled

relationships.name: unmatched
relationships.description: FlowFiles that do not match any user-define expression will be routed here

Routing Strategy.name: Routing Strategy
Routing Strategy.description: Specifies how to determine which relationship to use when evaluating the Expression Language

allowableValue.description: A copy of the FlowFile will be routed to each relationship whose corresponding expression evaluates to 'true'
Requires that all user-defined expressions evaluate to 'true' for the FlowFile to be considered a match
Requires that at least one user-defined expression evaluate to 'true' for the FlowFile to be considered a match

relationships.name: set state fail
relationships.description: A failure to set the state after adding the attributes to the FlowFile will route the FlowFile here.

relationships.name: success
relationships.description: All successful FlowFiles are routed to this relationship
